name: Woodwork Simulator
description:
Woodwork Simulator gives you the tools to work with wood in remarkably realistic ways. Using a range of tools, you’ll be able to saw with accurate precision, chisel to the depth you desire, drill without restraint, plane wood to a smooth finish, or carve out intricate designs on the lathe.

Please Note: Videos and images on this page are from a pre-Alpha version and are not reflective of the final quality, they will get updated as development progresses.

Endless Creativity

Explore your creativity in free-build mode where the only limit is your imagination!

Build to Specification

Apply your woodworking prowess in challenge mode, building furniture items from existing templates.

Exceptional Control

Saw, drill, chisel, plane, lathe, sand and glue with incredible precision!

Finishing Touches

Add a final flourish to your creations by applying wood oil and a range of paint colours to further customize your creations.
